ygData.subject: Re: Kelin's Lament
ygData.msgSnippet: You won t be able to do that. Our songs are now a lore item. This means that you can only have one in your possession (that includes the bank) at any one time
ygData.messageBody:
You won't be able to do that. Our songs are now a lore item. This means
that you can only have one in your possession (that includes the bank) at
any one time and you cannot trade or drop the item.

Tried it before they were marked as lore items. Lost 5 plat cause of it on
that very song doing that very thing.

Good Journey,

Sineras (Cazic-Thule)


-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]

Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kelin's Lament


From: John Kim <kim@...>

time this week. I could buy a couple extra copies and sell
them there.
